Airlift enables real-time modded drops anywhere on the map.. from our discord you can order and search from an inventory of base building containers, military tents and containers, underground bases, airraid explosive and contaminated gas bombs, or even a horde of heavy military zombies..

Venture up spawn to find fully loaded M3S, NPCs, Tents and Shipping Containers.. go further outside spawn and find vast castles to lay siege, faction bases, secret underground bases, and towering strongholds loaded with everything to build and stock a massive base.
